m_szDocTitle: New "Pomegranate Battery" Could Let EV Batteries Pack More Power
m_szDocSumamry: February 17th, 2014 by Tina Casey   Lithium-ion batteries have been the gold standard for powering electric vehicles, but with fuel cells breathing down their necks, the pressure is on to come up with next-generation performance improvements. A team of researchers has come up with a solution based on the structure of a pomegranate, which could combine greater efficiency with commercial-scale durability.
